DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Adult subject , 18 year old Adequate liver kidney function Prior history ≥grade 2 thrombocytopenia ( platelet nadir ≤ 75,000/microliters ) Ability ingest retain oral medication Practice acceptable birth control Ability understand follow study requirement Life expectancy least 3 month Exclusion criterion : History platelet disorder , dysfunction , bleed disorder Anticoagulant use within 2 week prior study start Females lactate expect History thromboembolic event drug induce thrombocytopenia History central nervous system , brain and/or leptomeningeal metastasis Prior surgery within 2 week radiotherapy within 4 week study start Preexisting cardiac disease
